WSO2 Support

Support team helps the customers and engagement teams on all the products developed by WSO2.

During this process the Support team communicates with all other teams within WSO2 such as RnD team, Solution Architecture team, Technical Content team, Sales team etc., to give the best informed, high quality help to our customers. By doing so we make sure the Customers and Engagement teams overcome their difficult situations in a timely manner.
